text: Cholistan University of Veterinary and Animal Sciences (CUVAS) is a Public University located in Bahawalpur, Punjab, Pakistan. It was established in 2014 on the initiative of Chief Minister Punjab Muhammad Shahbaz Sharif. ==Programs== CUVAS Bahawalpur offers the following program: Undergraduate Programs *Doctor of Veterinary Medicine (DVM) *BS Animal Sciences *BS Applied Microbiology *BS Biochemistry *BS Biological Sciences *BS Food Science and Technology *BS Medical Laboratory Technology *BS Poultry Science *BS Zoology *BS Zoology- 5th semester (Morning) +Diploma Programs: *Livestock Assistant Diploma (LAD) *Poultry Assistant Diploma (PAD) ==See also== * University of Veterinary and Animal Sciences, Lahore * Fisheries Research and Training Institute, Lahore * College of Veterinary and Animal Sciences, Jhang ==References== ==External links== * CUVAS official website Category:Public universities and colleges in Punjab, Pakistan Category:Veterinary schools in Pakistan Category:Educational institutions established in 2014 Category:2014 establishments in Pakistan Category:Universities and colleges in Bahawalpur District
title: Cholistan University of Veterinary and Animal Sciences
